TopicTitle: How to show craft description from VAB in flight?

Articles.Content: How do I display the craft description in flight? By description, I mean the text you can enter in the input field under the name in the VAB. I usually put my action groups and other useful info in that box, but I can never seem to find it when I need it in flight. Is there a mod? Am I just not looking in the right place? TIA

I don't believe it's possible. The description is a global setting for all craft of that design. The only thing that can be shown in-flight is info about that particular vessel.

If the description were anywhere, I'd think it would be on the vessel info button in map view ... but it's not there.
That sounds like the perfect thing to make a suggestion about in the Suggestion subforum
If you use the RPM mod (which you should, it's great!) the cockpit displays all become useful.  Amongst other things, they'll display the vehicle description, just as you want.

In all honesty, I think that the best option for referring to your action groups would be to go old school and write down a cheat sheet for your action groups on pen and paper. I'm personally a big fan of using real-life writing for references and such.

(Yay! My first post on forum!)
The other option is Action Groups Extended (AGX) which, amongst its awesomeness, allows you to see your action groups settings in flight.  It also lets you edit them, all 250 of them ^^.
